liveOnly.label: Live Only Mode
liveOnly.tooltip: True if you want it to only run when you are live

permission.label: Permission level
permission.tooltip: Set the permission level for participating

ignoreCaseSensitivity.label: Ignore Case Sensitivity
ignoreCaseSensitivity.tooltip: True if you want the word case sensitivity to be ignored when giving an answer

newQuestionOnAnswer.label: Switch questions fast
newQuestionOnAnswer.tooltip: True if you want it show a new question 10 seconds after someone guesses the answer instead of waiting for the remaining cycle time

minQuestionInterval.label: Min interval in minutes
minQuestionInterval.tooltip: Minimum interval in minutes before switching the question

maxQuestionInterval.label: Max interval in minutes
maxQuestionInterval.tooltip: Maximum interval in minutes before switching the question

separator.label: Separator
separator.tooltip: The characters used to seperate the questions and answers

OpenQuestionsFile.label: Open Questions File
OpenQuestionsFile.tooltip: Opens 'questions.txt' that contains all questions and answers seperated by new line.

costs.label: Cost to play the game
costs.tooltip: Set the default cost for this command.

minReward.label: Min reward
minReward.tooltip: Minimum ammount the user wins for writing the correct answer first

maxReward.label: Max reward
maxReward.tooltip: Maximum ammount the user wins for writing the correct answer first

responseAnnouncement.label: Word announcement message
responseAnnouncement.tooltip:
Message that will be posted when a new question is announced
 $question = The question
 $reward = Winning reward
 $cost = Cost to play
 $currency = Name of Currency

responseWon.value: $user answered the question first - $answer and won $reward $currency!
responseWon.label: User wins message
responseWon.tooltip:
Message that will be posted when the user writes the answer first
 $answer = The answer
 $question = The question
 $user = Username
 $reward = Winning reward
 $cost = Cost to play
 $currency = Name of Currency

responseLost.value: $user gave the wrong answer - $answer and lost $cost $currency!
responseLost.label: User lost message
responseLost.tooltip:
Message that will be posted when the user writes a wrong answer
 $answer = The answer
 $question = The question
 $user = Username
 $reward = Winning reward
 $cost = Cost to play
 $currency = Name of Currency

responseNotEnoughPoints.value: $user you need $cost $currency to play Murder Trivia.
responseNotEnoughPoints.label: Not enough points
responseNotEnoughPoints.tooltip:
Message that will be posted if the user doesn't have enough points.
 $answer = The answer
 $question = The question
 $user = Username
 $reward = Winning reward
 $cost = Cost to play
 $currency = Name of Currency

responseNotStarted.value: $user the trivia is not ready yet, get back later for more killing!
responseNotStarted.label: Not started
responseNotStarted.tooltip:
Message that will be posted if there isn't an active question right now.
 $answer = The answer
 $question = The question
 $user = Username
 $reward = Winning reward
 $cost = Cost to play
 $currency = Name of Currency

showRightAnswer.label: Enable nobody answered message
showRightAnswer.tooltip: True if you want it to show the right answer if nobody answered the question

responseNobody.label: Nobody answered message
responseNobody.tooltip:
Message that will be posted when nobody writes the right answer 
 $answer = The answer
 $question = The question
 $reward = Winning reward
 $cost = Cost to play
 $currency = Name of Currency
